column4: Hi all, I have a problem with snd-usb-audio on Hoary, how do I gather enough information to file a bug on it?
if i boot ubuntu with the usb audio hardware plugged in, the system is almost unusable, but if i manually modprobe snd-usb-audio before plugging in the usb audio everything is fine
sounds like enough information. once you've filed the bug, they'll let you know
